structure.unit: ARTICLE VI. LICENSING AND REGULATION OF FOR-HIRE LIMOUSINES.

text.section:
Sec. 31-605. Chauffeur's registration.
It shall be unlawful for any person to drive a limousine over any street in Miami-Dade County without first having obtained a chauffeur's registration from the CSD pursuant to of this Code. No later than January 1, 2002, initial limousine chauffeurs shall be required to complete an apprentice program as prescribed by the CSD.
